metadata.title: CVE-2019-5432 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.description:
A specifically malformed MQTT Subscribe packet crashes MQTT Brokers using the mqtt-packet module versions < 3.5.1, 4.0.0 - 4.1.3, 5.0.0 - 5.6.1, 6.0.0 - 6.1.2 for decoding.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2019-5432` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

node-mqtt-packet - 6.0.0-2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: node-mqtt-packet package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '6.0.0-2').
